home.home.Title: Modern Next.js Template
home.home.Subtitle: A beautifully designed template with shadcn/ui components, ready for your next project.

about.about.Title: About
about.about.Subtitle: A simple template for a React application
about.about.Description: This is a simple template for a React application. It includes a login and registration form, a header and footer, and a few other components. It is designed to be easy to use and customize, so you can quickly get started building your own React application.

messages.messages.RegistrationSuccess: Registration successful! You can now log in.

dialog.dialog.Title: Ready to begin?
dialog.dialog.Description: This template includes everything you need to build a modern web application with Next.js and shadcn/ui.

subsection.subsection.Title: Features
subsection.subsection.Subtitle: Everything you need to build beautiful, accessible web applications.
subsection.subsection.FeatureDescription: Built with TypeScript for type safety and modern security practices.
subsection.subsection.FeatureDescriptionTwo: Beautiful UI components from shadcn/ui that are fully accessible.
subsection.subsection.FeatureDescriptionThree: Built-in dark mode with easy toggling between light and dark themes.

templatestarter.templatestarter.Title: Getting Started
templatestarter.templatestarter.Subtitle: Follow these simple steps to get up and running with this template.
templatestarter.templatestarter.CloneSubTitle: Start by cloning this template repository to your local machine.
templatestarter.templatestarter.InstallSubTitle: Navigate to your project directory and install the dependencies.
templatestarter.templatestarter.RunSubTitle: Run the development server and start building your application.

newsletter.newsletter.Title: Stay Updated
newsletter.newsletter.Subtitle: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive updates and new features.

team.team.Title: Our Team
team.team.Subtitle: Meet the people behind this template.
